component.name: getContactNotes
component.description: Retrieves a list of notes of a specific contact.

component.name: createContactNote
component.description: Creates a new note for a specific contact.

component.name: getContactReminders
component.description: Retrieves a list of reminders of a specific contact.

component.name: createContactReminder
component.description: Creates a new reminder for a specific contact.

component.name: getContactDeals
component.description: Retrieves collection of deals which belong to a contact.
